Judul: INCREASING BRAND AWARENESS FOR PHOTOGRAPHY BUSINESS (CASE: COOVE)
Abstrak:
The phenomenon happening recently is the increasing demand of photography services.  
 

This demand has opened opportunities for a lot of category of photography. The most  
 

profitable area in photography are ceremonial and commercial photography service,  
 

COOVE is one of the service company that saw this opportunity, established in 2013,  
 

COOVE become a photography services company that provide ceremonial and  
 

commercial photo services. However, since 2013 until 2017 COOVE selling is always  
 

stagnate year to year and the awareness of the brand is not increasing. This study has  
 

some objectives, which to identify the reason of those problems and purpose new strategy  
 

to increase COOVE brand awareness.  
 

The research methodology is using qualitative methods. The first step is to identify the  
 

internal condition using Segmenting, Targeting and Positioning (STP) and Marketing mix  
 

(product, place, price, promotion, people, physical evidence and process). The next step  
 

of the research is an external analysis to analyse the external factor that could cause the  
 

internal issues of COOVE. The external analysis is using five PorterÃ‚Â’s forces and  
 

benchmark analysis. Then external and internal condition analyse with SWOT (Strength,  
 

Weakness, Opportunity and Threat). After those analyses the roots of the problem  
 

identified using fish bone diagram. It showed the main problem of the COOVE faced are  
 

unorganized job structure & lack of marketing program.  
 

To solve the problem which has been identified, the researcher proposed some solution  
 

to overcome the problem. First step, by using TOWS as a general solution then using  
 

Integrated Marketing Communication (IMC) to fixing the lacking of marketing program.  
 

IMC media included personal sales, advertising, exhibition, public relation, online market  
 

place, sales promotion and sponsorship.
Kata Kunci: COOVE, photography, service, brand awareness, marketing communication
